text: @IvankaTrump @realDonaldTrump ReOpen the Economy IDEAS:robotic devices that engulfs Coronavirus in the air 🦠{RNA/DNA}material, virus strains,etc.Also,an artificial intelligence app w/Bluetooth that gives head2toe PPE protection.This idea is called INVISIBLE PPE.#patent #buymyideas

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
